My Thinking Process

All of my projects are based off of a step by step process to ensure efficient results.

1

Planning

Understanding the purpose and needs of your project.

2

Design

Developing wireframes and planning a roadmap.

3

Implement

Connecting the front end to the back end side.

4

Testing/Deploy

Testing to find any glitches, bugs, bad performance, functionality and so on.

5

Maintenance

Website maintenance, general updates and adding new features.
